data.text: @Em_A_Lee27 Emily, please share with us through DM your reservation code. We will verify the situation. *HS
@jahozer Hi, Jah! If you'd like your case reviewed please send an email to amcustomersupport@aeromexico.com. One of our agents will gladly go over the available options for you. *GV
@_Goscar Please, through a DM,  send your request ant reservation code or ticket number. *OO

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
Due to Canadian government regulations, all passengers must present a negative COVID-19 PCR test and download the app ArriveCAN to provide requested information.
Upon arrival in Canada, passengers are required to self-isolate for 14 days.
Learn more: https://t.co/FgrdutuB0D https://t.co/HayXwu67lt

Fly safely. We have rigorously sanitized the entire cabin through an intensive disinfection process. This is one of the procedures that we have implemented as part of our Health and Sanitization Management System. Learn more: https://t.co/wcJ0KLhP3V https://t.co/bfDiBB4JtQ

@maggiesantolla Yrs, if you are going to use your vouchers, verify prices, changes or request the policiu for your tickets it is the option 1 since it is only through call center. In case you have a question we can help you through this via. *HS

@maggiesantolla Hello, in this case for use your voucher please contact us at 800 237 6639.  due to the situation we are having long waiting times in our call center, calls are answered in order of entry for the best service to our passengers. *HS

data.text: @ThaniaSalgado Hola, Thania.  En este caso, debes comunicarte al centro de reservaciones para que un ejecutivo pueda atender la situación. Desde México, 01 55 51 33 40 00 o, podrás encontrar todos los medios de contacto dentro del enlace: https://t.co/IZN4nev3V4. *SM

When you take care of yourself, you take care of us all. These are some of the measures we're taking to further reduce the onboard risk of contraction. Learn more about our thorough safety protocols currently in place at: https://t.co/KtQv4RVLD3 https://t.co/QzlFJtbPm0
Meet our new form of payment. With Uplift, you can pay for your trip comfortably with the flexibility you deserve. Click here to learn more! https://t.co/JkHKhNtWTP https://t.co/4DFAXhYbT1
